actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research, Gen. Leg.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Research and General Legislation

official_title: A bill to amend the United States Warehouse Act to allow States to require grain elevators with Federal warehouse licenses to participate in State grain indemnity funds or to require collateral security.
short_title: State Grain Fund Protection Act of 1991

summary.text: State Grain Fund Protection Act of 1991 - Amends the United States Warehouse Act to permit States to require federally licensed grain warehouses to participate in State grain indemnity funds or to require collateral security.

titles.title: State Grain Fund Protection Act of 1991

A bill to amend the United States Warehouse Act to allow States to require grain elevators with Federal warehouse licenses to participate in State grain indemnity funds or to require collateral security.
